account.description: the inbox or account parsed from the email

domain.description: the domain parsed from the email

status.description: the status of the given email address

error.description: the error message if the email is invalid

disposable.description: is the email a temporary or 'disposable' email address?

role_address.description: is the email aside for a function rather than a person (postmaster, sales, admin, info, etc)?

duration.description: the time it took to process your request
